attributes.action: ensure Harry Patch receives a Knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Henry John "Harry" Patch (born 17 June 1898) is, at the age of 110, the second-oldest living man in the UK and the sixth-oldest verified man in the world. Furthermore, he is one of the 90 oldest men ever. He is the last surviving soldier to have fought in the trenches of the First World War.

A Knighthood for a man who has served his Country and set an example to us all.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
